documentType: Bureau of Prisons count sheet and inmate roster
summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons count sheets and inmate rosters from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on July 24, 2019. It includes official out-count forms, inmate rosters, and count slips detailing inmate locations and counts by housing unit for that date.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine daily inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, including out-counts of inmates not in their housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on July 24, 2019, with register number 76318-054 and was housed in unit H01-001L.
The document shows standard Bureau of Prisons administrative procedures for tracking inmates, including out-count forms and inmate rosters.
Epstein's assignment category is listed as 'ATTY' on the inmate roster, which is the same category as another inmate, Tartaglione.
The count was scheduled for 4:00 PM on July 24, 2019, and involved multiple housing units within the facility.
The documents are part of the routine prison record-keeping and show Epstein was present and accounted for in the facility on this date.
